list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Remove blog app and associated assets.
Deleted the "blog" app along with its models, templates, static assets, and frontend scripts. This removes all related functionality, migrations, and configuration tied to the blog.

component.name: DjangoConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary:
Add initial structure with styling, scripts, and templates
This commit introduces the foundational structure for the project, including static assets like CSS, JavaScript, and SVGs, along with Django views and templates. It establishes the base layout, homepage, and core sections for streamlined media services.

Initialize Django apps and project structure
Added initial `__init__.py`, `apps.py`, and other setup files for `ad_spend`, `music_beta`, and `tfn_ctv` apps. Included ASGI configuration for `tfn_ctv` and IntelliJ database source configuration.

Add models, migrations, forms, and templates for core features
This commit introduces models for `ServiceRequest`, `User`, and updates existing models to support file uploads (e.g., artist images, album covers, audio files). It also adds forms for service requests, user signup, and ad campaign creation. New templates for service requests and enhanced JavaScript functionality (e.g., form validation, search, and music player) are included.

Add models, migrations, forms, and templates for core features
This commit introduces models for `ServiceRequest`, `User`, and updates existing models to support file uploads (e.g., artist images, album covers, audio files). It also adds forms for service requests, user signup, and ad campaign creation. New templates for service requests and enhanced JavaScript functionality (e.g., form validation, search, and music player) are included.

Add models, migrations, forms, and templates for core features
This commit introduces models for `ServiceRequest`, `User`, and updates existing models to support file uploads (e.g., artist images, album covers, audio files). It also adds forms for service requests, user signup, and ad campaign creation. New templates for service requests and enhanced JavaScript functionality (e.g., form validation, search, and music player) are included.

Add migrations for music app models and refine file fields
Initial migrations introduce models for Artist, Genre, Album, Track, User, ServiceRequest, and AdCampaign. Subsequent updates include replacing URL fields with file fields for media uploads, adding new fields (e.g., YouTube URL, track metadata, user agreements), and refining model functionalities.

Add initial blog app structure
Set up the foundational structure for the blog app with Django. Included are essential files: models, admin, views, tests, migrations, and app configuration.

Add blog app with models, migration, and admin integration
This commit introduces the initial structure for the blog app in Django. It includes a `Post` model, its corresponding migration, admin registration, and necessary configuration updates to settings. The app sets up the foundation for managing blog posts in the project.

Remove blog app and associated assets.
Deleted the "blog" app along with its models, templates, static assets, and frontend scripts. This removes all related functionality, migrations, and configuration tied to the blog.
